alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 3:49AM MST until December 26 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Central Carbon County, Southwest Carbon County and Upper North Platte River Basin. Includes the towns of Rawlins...Saratoga...Baggs and Encampment. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Patchy to areas of blowing snow from recent snowfall could reduce visibility to less than a half mile at times.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin
